description.fr:
{%FightTurnStarted} Déclenche son {%AT} sur les adversaires adjacents\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
\---
{#TROUPEAU}\_: {ATvalue:ppow,percent,abs,+} aux alliés autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> pour le tour.
description.en:
{%FightTurnStarted} Triggers {%AT} on adjacent\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> opponents.
\---
{#TROUPEAU}: {ATvalue:ppow,percent,abs,+} to surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> allies for the turn.
description.es:
{%FightTurnStarted} Activa su {%AT} en los adversarios adyacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
\---
{#TROUPEAU}: {ATvalue:ppow,percent,abs,+} a los aliados de alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> durante el turno.
description.de:
{%FightTurnStarted} Löst seinen {%AT} gegen angrenzende\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> Gegner aus.
\---
{#TROUPEAU}: {ATvalue:ppow,percent,abs,+} für die Verbündeten in der Nähe\_<sprite name="cell_around"> für die Runde.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnStarted} Aciona seu {%AT} sobre os adversários adjacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
\---
{#TROUPEAU}: {ATvalue:ppow,percent,abs,+} aos aliados em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> durante o turno.
